alert.note: Alert for Hidalgo (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Advisory issued September 06 at 5:08PM CDT until further notice by NWS Brownsville
info.description: ...FLOOD ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 815 PM CDT THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Flooding caused by excessive rainfall is expected. * WHERE...A portion of Deep South Texas, including the following county, Hidalgo. * WHEN...Until 815 PM CDT. * IMPACTS...Minor flooding in low-lying and poor drainage areas. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 508 PM CDT, Doppler radar indicated heavy rain due to thunderstorms. Minor flooding is ongoing or expected to begin shortly in the advisory area. - Some locations that will experience flooding include... Mission, Pharr, San Juan, Alamo, Donna, Hidalgo, Palmview, Palmhurst, South McAllen, North McAllen, Sharyland, Alton, Fields Elementary School, Mcallen Chamber Of Commerce, Hackberry Park, Archer Park, Mcallen City Hall, De Palmas Historic District, Newport Landing and Mcallen Police Department. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
